burn event opens a time-limited mint window. The contract integrates with      RecursiveStrategy to trigger token burns, and each burn creates a new window      during which users can mint. Scarcity is tied to burn frequency.","errors":{"AccountBalanceOverflow()":[{"details":"The recipient's balance has overflowed."}],"AlreadyInitialized()":[{"details":"Cannot double-initialize."}],"BalanceQueryForZeroAddress()":[{"details":"Cannot query the balance for the zero address."}],"NewOwnerIsZeroAddress()":[{"details":"The `newOwner` cannot be the zero address."}],"NoHandoverRequest()":[{"details":"The `pendingOwner` does not have a valid handover request."}],"NotOwnerNorApproved()":[{"details":"Only the token owner or an approved account can manage the token."}],"Reentrancy()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"TokenAlreadyExists()":[{"details":"The token already exists."}],"TokenDoesNotExist()":[{"details":"The token does not exist."}],"TransferFromIncorrectOwner()":[{"details":"The token must be owned by `from`."}],"TransferToNonERC721ReceiverImplementer()":[{"details":"Cannot safely transfer to a contract that does not implement the ERC721Receiver interface."}],"TransferToZeroAddress()":[{"details":"Cannot mint or transfer to the zero address."}],"Unauthorized()":[{"details":"The caller is not authorized to call the function."}]},"events":{"Approval(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables `account` to manage the `id` token."},"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables or disables `operator` to manage all of their tokens."},"MinEthForWindowUpdated(uint256)":{"params":{"newMinEth":"The new minimum ETH balance required in the strategy"}},"MintPriceUpdated(uint256)":{"params":{"newPrice":"The new mint price in wei"}},"Minted(uint256,uint256,address,bytes32)":{"params":{"minter":"Address that minted the token","seed":"The deterministic seed assigned to this token","tokenId":"The newly minted token's ID","windowId":"The window during which this token was minted"}},"MintingPausedChanged(bool)":{"params":{"paused":"True if minting is now paused, false if unpaused"}},"OwnershipHandoverCanceled(address)":{"details":"The ownership handover to `pendingOwner` has been canceled."},"OwnershipHandoverRequested(address)":{"details":"An ownership handover to `pendingOwner` has been requested."},"OwnershipTransferred(address,address)":{"details":"The ownership is transferred from `oldOwner` to `newOwner`. This event is intentionally kept the same as OpenZeppelin's Ownable to be compatible with indexers and [EIP-173](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-173), despite it not being as lightweight as a single argument event."},"PayoutRecipientUpdated(address)":{"params":{"newRecipient":"The new address that will receive mint payments"}},"RendererUpdated(address)":{"params":{"newRenderer":"The new renderer contract address"}},"StrategyUpdated(address)":{"params":{"newStrategy":"The new strategy contract address"}},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when token `id` is transferred from `from` to `to`."},"WindowCreated(uint256,uint64,uint64)":{"params":{"endTime":"Unix timestamp when minting closes","startTime":"Unix timestamp when minting opens","windowId":"The unique identifier for this window (1-indexed)"}},"WindowCreationEnabledChanged(bool)":{"params":{"enabled":"True if window creation is now enabled, false if disabled"}},"WindowDurationUpdated(uint256)":{"params":{"newWindowDuration":"The new window duration in seconds"}},"Withdrawn(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of ETH withdrawn","recipient":"The address that received the funds"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Sets `account` as the approved account to manage token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - The caller must be the owner of the token,   or an approved operator for the token owner. Emits an {Approval} event."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Returns the number of tokens owned by `owner`. Requirements: - `owner` must not be the zero address."},"canCreateWindow()":{"details":"Returns true only if: window creation enabled, no active window, strategy balance >= minEthForWindow, and TWAP delay met.      Note: This view function mirrors the conditions that would cause _createWindow() to revert.      If the strategy's processTokenTwap() revert conditions ever diverge from timeUntilFundsMoved(),      this function could return true when createWindow() would actually fail.","returns":{"_0":"True if createWindow() would likely succeed, false otherwise"}},"cancelOwnershipHandover()":{"details":"Cancels the two-step ownership handover to the caller, if any."},"completeOwnershipHandover(address)":{"details":"Allows the owner to complete the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`. Reverts if there is no existing ownership handover requested by `pendingOwner`."},"constructor":{"details":"Sets immutable strategy reference and configurable windowDuration","params":{"_mintPrice":"Initial mint price in wei","_owner":"Contract owner","_payoutRecipient":"Initial recipient for mint payments","_strategy":"Address of the RecursiveStrategy token","_windowDuration":"Duration of each mint window in seconds"}},"contractURI()":{"details":"Delegates to the renderer contract","returns":{"_0":"A data URI containing base64-encoded JSON collection metadata"}},"createWindow()":{"details":"Anyone can call this; will revert if a mint window is active, window creation is disabled, strategy balance is insufficient, or strategy burn fails.      Note: mint() will automatically create a window if needed, so this function is optional."},"getApproved(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the account approved to manage token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist."},"getMintCost(address,uint256)":{"details":"Calculates the sum of exponentially escalating prices","params":{"quantity":"The number of tokens to mint","user":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"The total cost in wei"}},"getMintCount(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"The number of mints for this user in the current window (0 if no active window)"}},"getSeed(uint256)":{"params":{"tokenId":"The token ID to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The deterministic seed used for this token's generative art"}},"getTokenData(uint256)":{"params":{"tokenId":"The token ID to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The TokenData struct containing windowId and seed"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"Returns whether `operator` is approved to manage the tokens of `owner`."},"isWindowActive()":{"returns":{"_0":"True if a mint window is currently open, false otherwise"}},"mint(uint256)":{"details":"Price escalates per wallet per window: price(n) = mintPrice * 1.5^(n-1)      where n is the nth mint for this wallet in this window.      If no window is active but one can be created, automatically creates a new window.","params":{"quantity":"Number of tokens to mint (must be >= 1)"}},"name()":{"returns":{"_0":"The name \"LESS\""}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the owner of the contract."},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the owner of token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist."},"ownershipHandoverExpiresAt(address)":{"details":"Returns the expiry timestamp for the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Allows the owner to renounce their ownership."},"requestOwnershipHandover()":{"details":"Request a two-step ownership handover to the caller. The request will automatically expire in 48 hours (172800 seconds) by default."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Equivalent to `safeTransferFrom(from, to, id, \"\")`."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Transfers token `id` from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - `from` must be the owner of the token. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - The caller must be the owner of the token, or be approved to manage the token. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement   {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"Sets whether `operator` is approved to manage the tokens of the caller. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event."},"setMinEthForWindow(uint256)":{"params":{"_minEthForWindow":"New minimum ETH amount in wei"}},"setMintPrice(uint256)":{"params":{"_mintPrice":"New price in wei"}},"setMintingPaused(bool)":{"params":{"_paused":"True to pause minting, false to unpause"}},"setPayoutRecipient(address)":{"params":{"_payoutRecipient":"New recipient address"}},"setRenderer(address)":{"params":{"_renderer":"New renderer address"}},"setStrategy(address)":{"params":{"_strategy":"New strategy address"}},"setWindowCreationEnabled(bool)":{"params":{"_enabled":"True to enable window creation, false to disable"}},"setWindowDuration(uint256)":{"params":{"_windowDuration":"New window duration in seconds"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165 This function call must use less than 30000 gas."},"symbol()":{"returns":{"_0":"The symbol \"LESS\""}},"timeUntilWindowCloses()":{"returns":{"_0":"Seconds until the window closes, or 0 if no window is active"}},"tokenURI(uint256)":{"details":"Reverts if the token does not exist or if renderer is not set","params":{"tokenId":"The token to get metadata for"},"returns":{"_0":"A data URI containing base64-encoded JSON metadata"}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfers token `id` from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - `from` must be the owner of the token. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - The caller must be the owner of the token, or be approved to manage the token. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`."},"withdraw()":{"details":"Only callable by owner. Sends entire contract balance to payoutRecipient."}},"stateVariables":{"_mintCountPerWindow":{"details":"windowId => minter => mintCount"}},"title":"Less","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"IncorrectPayment()":[{"notice":"Thrown when msg.value doesn't match the required mint price"}],"InsufficientStrategyBalance()":[{"notice":"Thrown when strategy ETH balance is below minEthForWindow threshold"}],"InvalidAddress()":[{"notice":"Thrown when an address parameter is invalid (zero address)"}],"InvalidQuantity()":[{"notice":"Thrown when quantity is zero"}],"MintWindowActive()":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to create a window while one is still active"}],"MintingPaused()":[{"notice":"Thrown when minting is paused"}],"WindowCreationDisabled()":[{"notice":"Thrown when window creation is disabled"}]},"events":{"MinEthForWindowUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the minimum ETH threshold for window creation is updated"},"MintPriceUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the mint price is updated by the owner"},"Minted(uint256,uint256,address,bytes32)":{"notice":"Emitted when a token is minted"},"MintingPausedChanged(bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when minting is paused or unpaused"},"PayoutRecipientUpdated(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the payout recipient is updated by the owner"},"RendererUpdated(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the renderer contract is updated by the owner"},"StrategyUpdated(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the strategy contract is updated by the owner"},"WindowCreated(uint256,uint64,uint64)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new window is created via createWindow()"},"WindowCreationEnabledChanged(bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when window creation is enabled or disabled"},"WindowDurationUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the mint window duration is updated"},"Withdrawn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when ETH is withdrawn from the contract"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"canCreateWindow()":{"notice":"Check if a window can be created"},"constructor":{"notice":"Initializes the Less NFT contract"},"contractURI()":{"notice":"Returns the collection-level metadata URI"},"createWindow()":{"notice":"Creates a new window by windows created"},"windowCreationEnabled()":{"notice":"Whether window creation is currently enabled"},"windowDuration()":{"notice":"Duration of each mint window in b.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf53a25143307304d9de7186f93f11faae3cc4f722c4b088aed6f4f8f87a02f7a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b722c08826ece540bbc4ee9f825aac501282c0900a0a2caa618154d77f23223d","dweb:/ipfs/QmeMsPT5S4vV8f7DYC2eZ7TBCrtRi9cKMsoW6Ca62Uaqwg"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets `account` as the approved account to manage token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - The caller must be the owner of the token,   or an approved operator for the token owner. Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens owned by `owner`. Requirements: - `owner` must not be the zero address.

canCreateWindow().details: Returns true only if: window creation enabled, no active window, strategy balance >= minEthForWindow, and TWAP delay met.      Note: This view function mirrors the conditions that would cause _createWindow() to revert.      If the strategy's processTokenTwap() revert conditions ever diverge from timeUntilFundsMoved(),      this function could return true when createWindow() would actually fail.

returns._0: True if createWindow() would likely succeed, false otherwise

cancelOwnershipHandover().details: Cancels the two-step ownership handover to the caller, if any.

completeOwnershipHandover(address).details: Allows the owner to complete the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`. Reverts if there is no existing ownership handover requested by `pendingOwner`.

constructor.details: Sets immutable strategy reference and configurable windowDuration

params._windowDuration: Duration of each mint window in seconds

returns._0: A data URI containing base64-encoded JSON collection metadata

createWindow().details: Anyone can call this; will revert if a mint window is active, window creation is disabled, strategy balance is insufficient, or strategy burn fails.      Note: mint() will automatically create a window if needed, so this function is optional.

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved to manage token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist.

getMintCost(address,uint256).details: Calculates the sum of exponentially escalating prices

params.quantity: The number of tokens to mint

returns._0: The number of mints for this user in the current window (0 if no active window)
The deterministic seed used for this token's generative art
The TokenData struct containing windowId and seed

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns whether `operator` is approved to manage the tokens of `owner`.

returns._0: True if a mint window is currently open, false otherwise

mint(uint256).details: Price escalates per wallet per window: price(n) = mintPrice * 1.5^(n-1)      where n is the nth mint for this wallet in this window.      If no window is active but one can be created, automatically creates a new window.

params.quantity: Number of tokens to mint (must be >= 1)

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of token `id`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist.

ownershipHandoverExpiresAt(address).details: Returns the expiry timestamp for the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the owner to renounce their ownership.

requestOwnershipHandover().details: Request a two-step ownership handover to the caller. The request will automatically expire in 48 hours (172800 seconds) by default.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Transfers token `id` from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - `from` must be the owner of the token. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - The caller must be the owner of the token, or be approved to manage the token. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement   {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Sets whether `operator` is approved to manage the tokens of the caller. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.

params._minEthForWindow: New minimum ETH amount in wei

params._paused: True to pause minting, false to unpause

params._enabled: True to enable window creation, false to disable

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165 This function call must use less than 30000 gas.

returns._0: Seconds until the window closes, or 0 if no window is active

tokenURI(uint256).details: Reverts if the token does not exist or if renderer is not set

params.tokenId: The token to get metadata for

returns._0: A data URI containing base64-encoded JSON metadata

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers token `id` from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - Token `id` must exist. - `from` must be the owner of the token. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - The caller must be the owner of the token, or be approved to manage the token. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`.

withdraw().details: Only callable by owner. Sends entire contract balance to payoutRecipient.

canCreateWindow().notice: Check if a window can be created

createWindow().notice: Creates a new window by triggering a burn on the strategy

getMintCost(address,uint256).notice: Get the total cost for a user to mint a specific quantity

getMintCount(address).notice: Get the number of mints a user has made in the current window

getSeed(uint256).notice: Get the seed for a token

isWindowActive().notice: Check if there is currently an active mint window

minEthForWindow().notice: Minimum ETH balance required in strategy contract to create a window

mint(uint256).notice: Mint tokens for the current active window with exponential pricing

mintPrice().notice: Price in wei to mint one token

setMinEthForWindow(uint256).notice: Update the minimum ETH balance required to create a window

timeUntilWindowCloses().notice: Get the time remaining in the current mint window

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Returns the token URI by delegating to the renderer

windowCreationEnabled().notice: Whether window creation is currently enabled

windowDuration().notice: Duration of each mint window in seconds

withdraw().notice: Withdraw accumulated ETH to the payout recipient
